thread.title: parts disappearing during animations

comments.text: when i was building my gun, some parts randomly inflated to large sizes and my sub-things shifted position, some even merged into the main thing's body. i reverted a few things but
now some parts of my gun, assumedly those that inflated, keep periodically flashing in and out of existence during the animations and state changes. these parts specifically do not
even have any other state than 1 that it could be. i am confused, think it might be a glitch. no idea how to reproduce it but i heard others having issues with disappearing parts..
added note: the person actually holding the gun does not see the parts flash, but everyone else does. for the user, the gun functions just fine.

thread.latestCommentText: added note: the person actually holding the gun does not see the parts flash, but everyone else does. for the user, the gun functions just fine.
